channel.title: Objectid on Top Secret Labs - Richard Sumilang
channel.description: Recent content in Objectid on Top Secret Labs - Richard Sumilang

item.title: How to create a MongoDB ObjectID from a timestamp using PHP
item.description: This is a useful tidbit of code to have until PHP adds this feature into their MongoDB extension. I stumbled on an example on Stack Overflow illustration showing how to do this and rewrote it in what I think is a slightly more modern way that does the same thing.
